session.objective: Respond to PR #955 review comments - verify test coverage and resolve review threads

tasks.details: Cannot run coverage locally: anthropic library not installed, pytest not installed, no Python CI configured
Thread PRRT_kwDOQoWRls5pw6z4 resolved with acknowledgment that regex fix was implemented in 5f3d5cf1
Thread PRRT_kwDOQoWRls5pxJas - explained test coverage status and infrastructure gap

decisions.rationale: Cannot verify 100% coverage without proper Python environment and CI. Better to be transparent about limitations than claim verification that didn't happen.
alternatives: Install dependencies and run coverage locally
risks: Reviewer may require actual coverage report

decisions.decision: Do not resolve human reviewer thread
decisions.rationale: Only the reviewer should resolve their own threads after verification

learnings.source: Tests exist but can't run without proper Python CI infrastructure
learnings.context: This repository has comprehensive Pester (PowerShell) CI but no Python test CI, despite having Python hooks

learnings.source: Anthropic library import in try-except block makes test mocking challenging
learnings.context: Tests try to mock 'invoke_skill_learning.Anthropic' but fail because import happens conditionally

prStatus.status: 2 review threads addressed: 1 resolved (bot), 1 awaiting reviewer response (human)
prStatus.blockers: Human reviewer waiting for coverage verification or CI setup
prStatus.nextSteps: Awaiting reviewer decision on whether tests are sufficient or Python CI needed
